price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߛߙߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ( ߘߏ߫ ߜߘߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ) ߝߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
